gestureListeners.transformation
Class CentricRotation3DListener

java.lang.Object
  gestureListeners.transformation.CentricRotation3DListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener
public class CentricRotation3DListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener

This class provides ways and means to rotate an AbstractGUIComponent in 3-dimensional space around an arbitrary vector. The rotation-axis will be defined through a given vector with its origin in the middle of the user's fingers On a virtual plane defined by the given vector the position-coordinates of the Object to be rotated.

Version:
20110921
Author:
langenhagen

Constructor Detail

CentricRotation3DListener

public CentricRotation3DListener(org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D axis,
                                 org.mt4j.components.MTComponent comp)
Constructor #1 Creates a new listener with the speceified plane axis relative to the given component's space. If the given component is null, the listener just user global coordinate space.

Parameters:
axis - The rotation-axis' direction vector as a Vector3D
comp - The component specifying the coordinate space as an MTComponent

CentricRotation3DListener

public CentricRotation3DListener(org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D axis)
Constructor #2
Creates a new listener with the specified plane axis in global coordinates.

Parameters:
axis - The rotation-axis' direction vector as a Vector3D
Method Detail

processGestureEvent

public boolean processGestureEvent(org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.MTGestureEvent ge)
This method will be triggered when the listener will be activated.

Specified by:
processGestureEvent in interface org.mt4j.input.inputProcessors.IGestureEventListener

setAxis

public void setAxis(org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D axis,
                    org.mt4j.components.MTComponent comp)
Sets the rotation axis according to the specified vector in the coordinate system of the specified component. If the given component is null, global coordinaes are assumed.

Parameters:
axis - The rotation-axis' direction vector as a Vector3D
comp - The component specifying the coordinate space as an MTComponent

setAxis

public void setAxis(org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D axis)
Sets the rotation axis according to the specified vector in global coordinate space.

Parameters:
axis - The rotation-axis' direction vector as a Vector3D

getAxis

public org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D getAxis()
Retrieves the repositioning-plane's axis used in this listener in the coordinates specified with setAxis(), or in the constructor.

Returns:
The rotation axis as a Vector3D

setHome

public CentricRotation3DListener setHome(Home home)
If you bind this listener On a home, you can forward this home to the listener, to manage movement of all items in the home, although they are no real children.

Parameters:
home - The home as a Home
Returns:
Returns itself
